name: The spaceship (tom07250)
description:
You are in a spaceship where a virus convert peaple to zombies has escaped from a study laboratory and now the whole crew member is infected there is only one person left who has the task of saving his life and defending himself in order to be able to return home safe and sound where he is it will find the antidote to the virus

the game is still in development it can have some bugs
